verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H1665>Gittith,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3039>amiable<s%> are your <S%H4908>tabernacles,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts!<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3700>longs,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3615>faints<s%> for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7442>cries<s%> out for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> the <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> an <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> a <S%H7064>nest<s%> for herself, <S%H834>where<s%> she may <S%H7896>lay<s%> her <S%H667>young,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H1004>house:<s%> they will be <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1984>praising<s%> you. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> whose <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in you; in whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> are the <S%H4546>ways<s%> of them.

Who <S%H5674>passing<s%> through the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1056>Baca<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H4599>well;<s%> the <S%H4175>rain<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5844>fills<s%> the <S%H1293>pools.<s%>
They <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H2428>strength,<s%> every one of them in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H7200>appears<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer:<s%> give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> our <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and <S%H5027>look<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of your <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

For a <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H2691>courts<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H505>thousand.<s%> I had <S%H977>rather<s%> be a <S%H5605>doorkeeper<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> than to <S%H1752>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H4043>shield:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H3519>glory:<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> thing will he <S%H4513>withhold<s%> from them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in you.
